title: mesa does not recognize libxcb version correctly
body:
I am trying to install mesa 12.0.3 using the command:

`spack install mesa@12.0.3 ^bison@3.0.4 ^dri2proto@2.8 ^dri3proto@1.0 ^glproto@1.4.17 ^libpthread-stubs@0.3 ^libxcb@1.12 ^libxext@1.3.3 ^libxshmfence@1.2 ^pkg-config@0.29.2 ^py-mako@1.0.4 ^flex@2.6.3 ^libdrm@2.4.70 ^libx11@1.6.3 ^libxdamage@1.1.4 ^libxfixes@5.0.2 ^openssl@1.0.1e ^presentproto@1.0 ^python@2.7.13+tk %gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64`

It fails with the following error:

```
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/cluster/apps/spack/var/spack/stage/mesa-12.0.3-ml7hu2oihsajd36kowkabf4d4zeo5ydm/mesa-12.0.3/configure' '--prefix=/cluster/spack/apps/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/mesa-12.0.3-ml7hu2oihsajd36kowkabf4d4zeo5ydm'
/cluster/apps/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/autotools.py:266, in configure:
     258      def configure(self, spec, prefix):
     259          """Runs configure with the arguments specified in
     260          :py:meth:`~.AutotoolsPackage.configure_args`
     261          and an appropriately set prefix.
     262          """
     263          options = ['--prefix={0}'.format(prefix)] + self.configure_args()
     264  
     265          with working_dir(self.build_directory, create=True):
  >> 266              inspect.getmodule(self).configure(*options)
```

Build logs show:

```
checking for GLPROTO... yes
checking for DRI2PROTO... yes
checking for DRI3PROTO... yes
checking for PRESENTPROTO... yes
configure: error: DRI3 requires xcb >= 1.9.3
```

but when checking the version of the xcb module with pkg-config, it finds the version that is new enough:

```
[spackapps@lo-login-02 ~]$ pkg-config --modversion xcb 
1.12
```

Anybody else experiencing the same problem ?
